channel.title: Rune Era
channel.description:
[b]Rune Era[/b] Hello Moparscape to Rune Era's Development Team thread. Rune Era: Rune Era was started by my friend, Java Guru, and me. We are bringing back RS in 2005. Here are more details: [ul][li]We Will be using [b]Drop Box[/b] to share the files.[/li] [li][b]Base:[/b]Hyperion[/li] [li][b]Client:[/b] A 317 deob[/li][/ul] To join our Development Team you must fill in the following:
Name: Java Experience(Show a piece of your work): Age: Job wanted: Why do you want to join?:[/color]
[color=#0000ff] You must show a piece of your [b]OWN [/b]work to show that you actually have the amount of Java experience you have. Please PM me your piece of work. [b].::.Positions.::.[/b] [b]Server Programmers:[/b] [b]Boss: [/b]Java Guru & Scape-JAVA [ul][li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li][/ul] [b]Client Programmer:[/b] [b]Boss:[/b] Seif (Me) [ul][li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li][/ul] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ PICTURES: Coming Soon.

item.title: Rune Era
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

Name: Tony
Java Experience(Show a piece of your work): None at all. For RSPS probably, Sinzscape, Mithscape 508, JustixScape 474.
Age: 16
Job wanted: Server Programmer or Forum Creator
Why do you want to join?: Because i think this is going somewhere is Scape-JAVA is in the Devolopment.

Read full topic
